document.docAuthor: Pocco, Martina E. & Cigliano, María Marta
document.masterDocTitle: The grasshoppers (Orthoptera, Acridomorpha) from the Mitaraka Mountain Range, French Guiana

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The grasshoppers (Orthoptera, Acridomorpha) from the Mitaraka Mountain Range, French Guiana

caption.paragraph:
TABLE 1. — List of Acridomorpha ( Orthoptera ) recorded from French Guiana, South America (based on the available literature,
Cigliano et al. 2019
; * new records. from this study).

subSection.paragraph:
6.
Euprepacris charpentieri ( Descamps & Amédégnato, 1970 )
7.
Habrolampis nemorensis ( Descamps, 1978 )

17.
Titanacris picticrus picticrus ( Descamps, 1978 )
18.
Tropidacris collaris (Stoll, 1813)

20.
Trybliophorus octomaculatus Serville, 1831
21.
Trybliophorus sulcatus Descamps, 1981
*

subSubSection.paragraph: Pyrgomorphidae Brunner von Wattenwyl, 1874 XVII. Pyrgomorphinae Brunner von Wattenwyl, 1874

subSection.paragraph:
DISTRIBUTION. — As for most of species of the genus
Silvitettix Bruner, 1904
the distribution range is reduced and it is known to occur in the forests of French Guiana and Guyana ( Otte & Jago 1979 )
.
